work.name: Research Intern, Ant Group
work.summary: Focusing on cardiac image synthesis and diagnosis.

education.institution: University of Electronic Science and Technology of China, Chengdu, China

awards.title: "Top 10 Outstanding Students" of the School of Information and Communication Engineering, UESTC
awards.awarder: School of Information and Communication Engineering, UESTC
awards.summary: The "Top 10 Outstanding Students" award recognizes students who have excelled in academics, research, and extracurricular activities.

awards.title: "Challenge Cup" Grand Prize
awards.summary: The "Challenge Cup" is a prestigious national competition in China that encourages innovation and entrepreneurship among university students.

awards.title: 1st Place in ReMIND @ MICCAI Learn2Reg Challenge
awards.summary: Win the first place in the ReMIND @ MICCAI Learn2Reg Challenge, a competition focused on multi-modal registration of ultrasound and MR images.

awards.title: Graduate Student National Scholarship of China
awards.awarder: Ministry of Education of the People's Republic of China
awards.summary: The Graduate Student National Scholarship is awarded to graduate students who have demonstrated outstanding academic performance and research potential.

projects.name: AR Brain Surgical Navigation System
projects.summary: An augmented reality (AR) surgical navigation system designed for craniotomy procedures, integrating preoperative MRI data with real-time 3D anatomical models and intraoperative endoscopic video streams to provide surgeons with enhanced spatial awareness and improved surgical precision.
